channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- eSpace Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- eSpace Desktop

item.title: CVE-2018-7976|2024-08-05T06:37:59.634Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- espace%20desktop
item.description: There is a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Huawei eSpace Desktop V300R001C00 and V300R001C50 version. Due to the insufficient validation of the input, an authenticated, remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to send abnormal messages to the system and perform a XSS attack. A successful exploit could cause the eSpace Desktop to hang up, and the function will restore to normal after restarting the eSpace Desktop.
